meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with our 30in. vanity set featuring a 5in. deep basin and 18in. wide sink. Made of solid wood, this modern set includes a ceramic vanity top and soft-close hinges. No assembly required. Hardware included. Low-lead compliant. 3 year warranty."
meta_title: '30" Cambria Vanity Set | Wood Cabinet | Ceramic Top'
